description: Detects usage of cmdkey to add generic credentials. As an example, this has to be used before connecting to an RDP session via command line interface.
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: New Generic Credentials Added Via Cmdkey.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\cmdkey.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"cmdkey.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ \/g*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \/u*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \/p*"))
